query:
INSERT INTO courses (
  regionId,
  title,
  description,
  framework,
  level,
  durationHours,
  price,
  stripePriceId,
  price3Month,
  price6Month,
  price12Month,
  stripePriceId3Month,
  stripePriceId6Month,
  stripePriceId12Month,
  modules,
  active
) VALUES (
  1,
  'NIST AI RMF Fundamentals',
  'Master the NIST AI Risk Management Framework with comprehensive training on the four core functions (Govern, Map, Measure, Manage) and seven trustworthy AI characteristics. Learn to build trustworthy AI systems through structured risk management. Duration: 20 hours. Prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts (recommended but not required). Target Audience: AI practitioners, compliance officers, risk managers, product managers.',
  'NIST AI RMF',
  'fundamentals',
  20,
  49900,
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPl2cnJPC0',
  19900,
  9900,
  5900,
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPBbZOgee2',
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPt1H4qz4H',
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgP9AreWlme',
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Introduction to NIST AI RMF', 'description', 'Learn the framework structure, voluntary nature, and how it aligns with other standards', 'durationMinutes', 90, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Trustworthy AI Characteristics', 'description', 'Explore the seven characteristics of trustworthy AI systems', 'durationMinutes', 120, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'GOVERN Function', 'description', 'Understand governance structures and risk management policies', 'durationMinutes', 150, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'MAP Function', 'description', 'Learn to map AI system context and categorize risks', 'durationMinutes', 150, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'MEASURE Function', 'description', 'Master risk measurement and assessment methodologies', 'durationMinutes', 150, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'MANAGE Function', 'description', 'Implement risk management strategies and controls', 'durationMinutes', 150, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'AI Lifecycle and Actors', 'description', 'Understand roles and responsibilities across the AI lifecycle', 'durationMinutes', 120, 'content', ''),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Implementation Roadmap and Best Practices', 'description', 'Create your organization AI risk management implementation plan', 'durationMinutes', 120, 'content', '')
  ),
  1
);
